meta_title: What is a Gantt Chart? Definition & Industrial Use Cases
meta_description: A Gantt chart is a visual scheduling tool used to map maintenance tasks, dependencies, and timelines. It is essential for minimizing industrial asset downtime.
title: What Is a Gantt Chart?

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What Is a Gantt Chart?

image_prompt: A high-resolution, photo-realistic image of a maintenance manager in a modern industrial plant wearing a white hard hat and safety vest. The manager is pointing at a large, wall-mounted digital touchscreen display that shows a complex, colorful Gantt chart with various dependencies and milestones. In the blurred background, a diverse team of technicians in PPE is working near a large automated conveyor system. Cinematic lighting, professional industrial atmosphere, no text.
